pages.text:
About Us
The Richardson Community Center is run by a volunteer Board of Directors. The Board and staff oversee the operations of the center, including activities, events, facility rentals, sports and summer programs, and open gym hours.

The Richardson Community Center is run by a volunteer Board of Directors. The Board and staff oversee the operations of the center, including activities, events, facility rentals, sports and summer programs, and open gym hours.
